author: chanderprakash20

author: boma_naps
content: I don't think project ideas is complete yet, but here https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-six/blob/main/projects/project-ideas.md you will see RIG open problems for EPF i guess.

content: ok got it if any information come related with Research Please share could tell to me where is the ethereum team Research papers and findings is ?

author: boma_naps
content: If you check the second link I shared, you'll see all research-related work in Ethereum and proper links to specific research or ongoing work. What I don't know is if they have a dedicated communication channel or something of the sort.

author: mariohavel
content: Research is a very broad term. From the topics you mentioned like l2 zk, that's not part of the core protocol. Please read the program guide and make yourself familiar with its areas and processes

author: chanderprakash20
content: yes I have read I am asking there is Research project related to core protocol layer1 like as in previous cohort related to the EVM cost pricing analysis or etc is it that kind of project are coming where I can  work as Researcher or not ?
